Real-time data integration platform

StreamDuo is a platform for B2B data integration.

Try it for Free

Simple, secure event streams for data integration.

Connect partners with your event-driven architecture. Provision private, secure data streams for a real-time integration with external partners.

Simple.

Read & Write using simple APIs



Secure.

Provision and manage Oauth2 machine credentials



Fast.

Start sending events in minutes, with no infrastructure.

How it Works

With StreamDuo you write records to a private stream using simple APIs. Once you grant access to your partners, they read records using flexible APIs to fit any use case.


1. Create a Stream

A Stream is a private channel for you to read and write records.



2. Grant Access to your Partners

You control who can read and write, add a partner in the console to grant them access.



3. Write Data

Write records in real-time, using simple APIs. Records are stored in a queue and their read status is tracked.



4. Read Data

Read records using simple APIs. Polling for unread records will give you a streaming data connection with any partner.
